name: ShortestCircuit
description:
Shortest Circuit is a 2 player split screen sort of race (Use controllers). 

The objective is to be the first one to capture 4 power stations. 
You can steal power stations from the other player.

Tips:
-Controls are garbo they pretty much always assume that the forward direction is the one in which you start.

Credits:
- I used PathCreator (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/utilities/b-zier-path-creator-136082) and heavily modified the
PathFollower Script (nothing good xD).

Thoughts:
- Was difficult to get done before end of deadline as I was working on it by myself. I wanted to add one extra mechanic for 
when players smash into each other on the rails but couldnt get to it. Quite a bit more I wanted to do art wise 
including another custom shader for the 3D models as well as way more 3D models to populate the city (ended up doing the 3D models I have in these last
few hours today 8/30/2020). There is also no sound it just fell out of scope.
I actually learned quite a bit that I am going to take back to my other personal project which is basically a harvest moon clone.
I am grateful for the experience and had lots of fun hopefully whoever plays this enjoys it. 

-Thanks Nick
